name: Cowboy Roundup
description:
REQUIRES HTML5 Capable Browser (Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome etc)

Herd your cows in a straight line for as long as possible but watch out for those nasty fences! Don't let your cows stray too far to the left or right! The longer you herd your cows, and the more cows you have, the higher your score will be. Download Cowboy Roundup on Android on the Google Play Marketplace to compete for control of the leaderboard for the top score! It's free to play, but feel free to donate so I can keep making whacky little games!
